TITLE: Episode 17 - So What if I’m a Truther?
DESCRIPTION: Maddie and Jessie reflect on the anniversary of 9/11. They talk about America before and after the horrific attack, how American foreign policy may have played a role and how the official 9/11 government story doesn’t add up. Have all the changes our government has made since 9/11 made us any safer?
